attributes.action: Review the awarding of the Police Long Service & Good Conduct Medal .....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is widely acknowledged that the Police service has undergone much reform in the last 10 or more years and that as a result the demands on officers are significantly higher. The long service medal has not undergone any such change or review since its inception in 1951. I propose the qualification period for the award be brought in line with similar awards to the Fire Service and Armed Forces.
